Empower Your Institution with Customized Websites

Create a professional and personalized website effortlessly, whether you prefer customizable templates or a unique design from scratch. Our intuitive admin app centralizes student management, record-keeping, and enquiry handling, allowing you to streamline administrative processes and save valuable time.

TECHNICAL BENEFITS

Why Aintrie ?

Build, Customize, and Manage Your Institution's Online Presence effortlessly.

For Hostels, Coaching Centers,

Whether you run a hostel, coaching center, or any educational institution, our platform adapts to your needs. Tailored features for specialized management.

24/7 Support

Our experienced support engineers are available round the clock for any resolution of query.

Data Security

Implementation of "Zero Trust" access layer for authentication & authorisation of canvas application.

Customized Website

Create a unique online identity for your institution. Choose from our customizable templates or start from scratch. No coding required!
